title: I'm a data scientist and R developer with a background in social science. My work focuses on causal inference in observational settings, with application to criminal justice and gun violence. I have a longstanding interest in sports analytics and developing data science tools.

markdown.headingText: I'm a data scientist and R developer with a background in social science. My work focuses on causal inference in observational settings, with application to criminal justice and gun violence. I have a longstanding interest in sports analytics and developing data science tools.
markdown.markdown:
\ ### Education ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} **Nuffield College, University of Oxford** PhD in Sociology - Research Areas: Social Networks, Statistical Inference on Networks, Gun Violence - Funded by Economic and Social Research Council ::: ::: {.text-end} 2017 ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} **St Cross College, University of Oxford** MSc in Sociology ::: ::: {.text-end} 2012 ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} **University of Sheffield** BA in Sociology with First-Class Honours ::: ::: {.text-end} 2011 ::: ::: ### Experience ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} **New York University** Moore-Sloan Faculty Fellow, Center for Data Science ::: ::: {.text-end} 2020--present ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} **Northwestern University** Postdoctoral Fellow, Institute for Policy Research - Supervised by Andrew Papachristos ::: ::: {.text-end} 2019--2020 ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} **Yale University** Postdoctoral Associate, Institution for Social and Policy Studies - Supervised by Andrew Papachristos ::: ::: {.text-end} 2017--2019 ::: ::: ### Teaching **New York University** ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} `DS-GA 1017` and `DS-UA 202` Responsible Data Science - Technical course that tackles issues of data quality, algorithmic fairness,
transparency of data and algorithms, ethics, privacy, and data protection. - Find out more about the course [here](https://dataresponsibly.github.io/rds/). ::: ::: {.text-end} 2021, 2022 ::: ::: ::: {.d-flex .justify-content-between} ::: {} `DS-UA 111` Data Science for Everyone - Flagship course at the Center for Data Science. - Designed for students without prior statistics or programming experience. ::: ::: {.text-end} 2021, 2022 ::: :::
